content.rendered:
Diploma in Web Design Course

Web designing is the process of creating stunning websites which are graphically super reach and user friendly. Almost all companies , organizations or any business needs a website now a days. Web designers are much in demand in all cities like Nasik , Mumbai  , Pune , Delhi, Bangluru , Hydarabad etc. Here the Web Designer has to be an expert at creating websites which people like to visit in terms of ease of use, great presentation including looks, colors and graphics.

If you’re thinking of becoming a professional Web designer, there are a number of things to consider. Firstly, there are many different avenues you can take as a professional Web Designer. You can also choose to go freelance or work in a corporation. And being a Web Designer make sure you know what the job will entail. Finally, getting certification or other education is a great way to make sure you’re prepared. Vmaxinfo Instituteprovide Diploma in web Design course in punewith professional guidance, lot of practicals, Live Projects and placement assistance. This course can be done by any graduate  or under graduate  like Engineer, MCA, MCM, MCS, B.A., B.Com, B.Sc. Many students do career in Web Designing after 12th/ HSC also.

Vmaxinfo Instituteoffer short term and long terms courses in Web Designing. We have 3 Months to 1 year Diploma courses in Web Design and Development. Both courses are career oriented and have good scope in getting jobs.

Web Design Course Content

Vmaxinfo Institutehas designed the syllabus of Web Designing course by considering the requirement of industries in this filed. IT companies always look for Web Designer with specialization in specific area or with multiple platform. Below are course content of Web Design and Development course Diploma.

Web Design

  • HTML5, CSS3
  • Bootstrap
  • JavaScript – jQuery inegration
  • Dreamweaver
  • WordPress CMS
  • Google Map integration
  • Web Hosting and FTP

Duration: 150 Hrs

Graphics Design

  • Photoshop
  • Photo Editing
  • Banner Design
  • UI Design
  • Web Layout Design
  • CorelDraw
  • illustrator
  • Logo Design
  • Brochure Design
  • Ad Design

Duration: 150 Hrs

Digital Marketing

  • Concept of Digital Marketing
  • Content Writing
  • Blog and Websites
  • Search Engine Optimization
  • Social Media Marketing
  • Google Search Console
  • Affiliate Marketing
  • Email Marketing
  • Case Study

Duration: 100 Hrs

Web Development

  • PHP, MySQL
  • JavaScript, jQuery
  • Ajax, XML
  • Angular JS,
  • Web Application Development
  • CodeIgniter Framework
  • WordPress
  • Project

Duration 150 Hrs

Opportunities with Web Design Course

There are lot of career opportunities after Web Design Diploma course in IT and non-IT companies such as Web Designer, Graphics Designer, Digital Marketing and Web Developer. Check out following sites for career opportunities.

Web Designer Job in punefrom Naukri.COM

Web Design Job from indeed
